tabs.text:
♟️ Welcome to the World of Chess!

Chess ek ancient aur intelligent board game hai jo duniya bhar me khela jaata hai. Ye game aapke dimaag ko tez banata hai, planning aur patience sikhata hai.

Aaiye, is game ke rules, history aur smart tips ko jaane, aur smartly play karna sikhe!

🎯 Chess Rules & Winning Tips

- Board Layout: 8x8 squares, alternating colors
- Pieces: King, Queen, Rook, Bishop, Knight, Pawn
- Goal: Opponent ke King ko "Checkmate" karna

✅ Tips:
✔ Opening me center control karo
✔ Queen ko jaldi mat nikaalo
✔ King ko early castling se safe rakho
✔ Opponent ki moves ka dhyan rakho
✔ Practice daily!

🏛️ History of Chess (Shatranj)

- Origin: 6th century India (Chaturanga)
- Persia me iska naam bana 'Shatranj'
- Europe me evolve hoke aaj ka modern Chess bana
- First World Champion: Wilhelm Steinitz (1886)
- Aaj Chess online aur real tournaments dono me popular hai (Magnus Carlsen, Vishwanathan Anand jaise legends)

🤝 Responsible Chess Playing

- Har game me fair play zaruri hai
- Kabhi cheating tools ya engines ka use mat karein
- Online Chess me opponent ko respect de
- Apna screen time balance karein – overplaying se bachein
- Practice karein, but enjoyment ke saath!
